name: ORS Discharge Balance Analysis Report
description:
This report produces discharge balance details for all prisoners due to be discharged in a selected prison on a date entered by the user. For each prisoner it returns:
- Account balances
- The discharge payments (due to grants)
- The outstanding advances
- The totals.
FIN0006 - v00.01.00 Last Modified: 19/05/09

dataset.name: Prisoners to be Discharged
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2, 1, 1) || '.' END END AS INITIALS, AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED.EVENT_DATE, AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED.START_TIME, AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED.EVENT_TYPE, AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED.EVENT_SUB_TYPE_DESC, AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED.EVENT_ID FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, V_OFFENDER_ALL_SCHEDULES AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED WHERE (AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED.EVENT_CLASS = 'EXT_MOV') AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED.EVENT_DATE = (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Discharge Date (dd/mm/yyyy):','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED.EVENT_STATUS = 'SCH' AND AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED.EVENT_DATE >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED.EVENT_STATUS = 'SCH' AND (AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED.DIRECTION_CODE = 'OUT' OR AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED.DIRECTION_CODE IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AGY_LOC_ID, LAST_NAME, INITIALS, EVENT_DATE, START_TIME, EVENT_TYPE, EVENT_SUB_TYPE_DESC, EVENT_ID, LAST_NAME || OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS V_PRISONER, DISCHARGE_PAYMENTS_WITH_EVENT_ID.SUM_OF_TRANSACTION_AMOUNT || SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_AVAILABLE || SUM_OF_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT_BALANCE || SUM_OF_SPEND_ACCOUNT_BALANCE - OFFENDER_ADVANCES.OUTSTANDING_ADVANCE AS V_DISCHARGE_TOTAL FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Discharge Payments with Event ID
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2, 1, 1) || '.' END END AS INITIALS, SUM(AT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTIONS.TXN_ENTRY_AMOUNT) AS SUM_OF_TRANSACTION_AMOUNT, AT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTIONS.EVENT_ID FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_TRANSACTIONS AT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTIONS.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID IN (SELECT OT.OFFENDER_ID FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_TRANSACTIONS OT WHERE OT.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID || OT.EVENT_ID IN (SELECT a.offender_book_id || a.event_id AS BOOK_EVENT FROM offender_ind_schedules a WHERE event_status = 'SCH' AND (a.direction_code = 'OUT' OR a.direction_code IS NULL) AND a.event_date >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND a.event_date = (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter Discharge Date (dd/mm/yyyy):','d',mono,free,,Not_Persistent) */) UNION ALL SELECT ce.offender_book_id || event_id FROM court_events ce, reference_codes rc WHERE ce.court_event_type = rc.code AND rc.domain = 'MOVE_RSN' AND (ce.event_status = 'SCH' OR ce.event_status IS NULL) AND (ce.direction_code = 'OUT' OR ce.direction_code IS NULL) AND ce.event_date >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND ce.event_date = (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter Discharge Date (dd/mm/yyyy):','d',mono,free,,Not_Persistent) */) UNION ALL SELECT ord.offender_book_id || event_id FROM offender_release_details ord, reference_codes codes WHERE ord.movement_reason_code = codes.code (+) AND codes.domain (+) = 'MOVE_RSN' AND ord.event_status = 'SCH' AND ord.release_date >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND ord.release_date = (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter Discharge Date (dd/mm/yyyy):','d',mono,free,,Not_Persistent) */)))) AND NOT AT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTIONS.EVENT_ID IS NULL) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2, 1, 1) || '.' END END, AT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTIONS.EVENT_ID), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AGY_LOC_ID, LAST_NAME, INITIALS, SUM_OF_TRANSACTION_AMOUNT, EVENT_ID, LAST_NAME || OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS V_PRISONER, DISCHARGE_PAYMENTS_WITH_EVENT_ID.SUM_OF_TRANSACTION_AMOUNT || SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_AVAILABLE || SUM_OF_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT_BALANCE || SUM_OF_SPEND_ACCOUNT_BALANCE - OFFENDER_ADVANCES.OUTSTANDING_ADVANCE AS V_DISCHARGE_TOTAL FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Discharge Payments
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2, 1, 1) || '.' END END AS INITIALS, SUM(AT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTIONS.TXN_ENTRY_AMOUNT) AS SUM_OF_TRANSACTION_AMOUNT FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_TRANSACTIONS AT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTIONS.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID IN (SELECT OT.OFFENDER_ID FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_TRANSACTIONS OT WHERE OT.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID || OT.EVENT_ID IN (SELECT a.offender_book_id || a.event_id AS BOOK_EVENT FROM offender_ind_schedules a WHERE event_status = 'SCH' AND (a.direction_code = 'OUT' OR a.direction_code IS NULL) AND a.event_date >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND a.event_date = (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter Discharge Date (dd/mm/yyyy):','d',mono,free,,Not_Persistent) */) UNION ALL SELECT ce.offender_book_id || event_id FROM court_events ce, reference_codes rc WHERE ce.court_event_type = rc.code AND rc.domain = 'MOVE_RSN' AND (ce.event_status = 'SCH' OR ce.event_status IS NULL) AND (ce.direction_code = 'OUT' OR ce.direction_code IS NULL) AND ce.event_date >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND ce.event_date = (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter Discharge Date (dd/mm/yyyy):','d',mono,free,,Not_Persistent) */) UNION ALL SELECT ord.offender_book_id || event_id FROM offender_release_details ord, reference_codes codes WHERE ord.movement_reason_code = codes.code (+) AND codes.domain (+) = 'MOVE_RSN' AND ord.event_status = 'SCH' AND ord.release_date >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND ord.release_date = (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter Discharge Date (dd/mm/yyyy):','d',mono,free,,Not_Persistent) */)))) AND NOT AT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTIONS.EVENT_ID IS NULL) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2, 1, 1) || '.' END END), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AGY_LOC_ID, LAST_NAME, INITIALS, SUM_OF_TRANSACTION_AMOUNT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Outstanding Advance
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2, 1, 1) || '.' END END AS INITIALS, OFFENDER_DEDUCTIONS.MAX_TOTAL_AMOUNT - OFFENDER_DEDUCTIONS.DEDUCTION_AMOUNT - OFFENDER_DEDUCTIONS.ADJUSTMENT_AMOUNT AS OFFENDER_ADVANCES_OUTSTANDIN37 FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, OFFENDER_DEDUCTIONS WHERE (OFFENDER_DEDUCTIONS.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND OFFENDER_DEDUCTIONS.ADJUSTMENT_REASON_CODE IS NULL AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID IN (SELECT OT.OFFENDER_ID FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_TRANSACTIONS OT WHERE OT.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID || OT.EVENT_ID IN (SELECT a.offender_book_id || a.event_id AS BOOK_EVENT FROM offender_ind_schedules a WHERE event_status = 'SCH' AND (a.direction_code = 'OUT' OR a.direction_code IS NULL) AND a.event_date >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND a.event_date = (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter Discharge Date (dd/mm/yyyy):','d',mono,free,,Not_Persistent) */) UNION ALL SELECT ce.offender_book_id || event_id FROM court_events ce, reference_codes rc WHERE ce.court_event_type = rc.code AND rc.domain = 'MOVE_RSN' AND (ce.event_status = 'SCH' OR ce.event_status IS NULL) AND (ce.direction_code = 'OUT' OR ce.direction_code IS NULL) AND ce.event_date >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND ce.event_date = (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter Discharge Date (dd/mm/yyyy):','d',mono,free,,Not_Persistent) */) UNION ALL SELECT ord.offender_book_id || event_id FROM offender_release_details ord, reference_codes codes WHERE ord.movement_reason_code = codes.code (+) AND codes.domain (+) = 'MOVE_RSN' AND ord.event_status = 'SCH' AND ord.release_date >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND ord.release_date = (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Enter Discharge Date (dd/mm/yyyy):','d',mono,free,,Not_Persistent) */)))))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AGY_LOC_ID, LAST_NAME, INITIALS, OFFENDER_ADVANCES_OUTSTANDIN37, LAST_NAME || OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS V_PRISONER, DISCHARGE_PAYMENTS_WITH_EVENT_ID.SUM_OF_TRANSACTION_AMOUNT || SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_AVAILABLE || SUM_OF_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT_BALANCE || SUM_OF_SPEND_ACCOUNT_BALANCE - OFFENDER_ADVANCES.OUTSTANDING_ADVANCE AS V_DISCHARGE_TOTAL FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Today
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AS TODAY_ FROM OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */))), dataset_ AS (SELECT AGY_LOC_ID, TODAY_ FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Balances
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2, 1, 1) || '.' END END AS INITIALS, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_ACCOUNT_CODES.ACCOUNT_CODE) = 2101 THEN AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.BALANCE ELSE 0 END) AS SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_AVAILABLE, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_ACCOUNT_CODES.ACCOUNT_CODE) = 2103 THEN AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.BALANCE ELSE 0 END) AS SUM_OF_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT_BALANCE, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_ACCOUNT_CODES.ACCOUNT_CODE) = 2102 THEN AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.BALANCE ELSE 0 END) AS SUM_OF_SPEND_ACCOUNT_BALANCE, AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.CASELOAD_ID FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS, OMS_OWNER.ACCOUNT_CODES AT_ACCOUNT_CODES WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.OFFENDER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_ACCOUNT_CODES.ACCOUNT_CODE = AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.TRUST_ACCOUNT_CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',mono,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */)) AND AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.CASELOAD_ID = (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Establishment Code','A','Accounts\Sub Accounts Caseload ID',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:1) */) AND AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, V_OFFENDER_ALL_SCHEDULES AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED WHERE (AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED.EVENT_CLASS = 'EXT_MOV') AND (AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED.EVENT_DATE = (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Discharge Date (dd/mm/yyyy):','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED.EVENT_STATUS = 'SCH' AND AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED.EVENT_DATE >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED.EVENT_STATUS = 'SCH' AND (AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED.DIRECTION_CODE = 'OUT' OR AV_OFF_ALL_EXTERNAL_SCHED.DIRECTION_CODE IS NULL)))) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME, 1, 1) || '.' || CASE WHEN AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(AT_OFFENDER.MIDDLE_NAME_2, 1, 1) || '.' END END, AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.CASELOAD_ID), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AGY_LOC_ID, LAST_NAME, INITIALS, SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_AVAILABLE, SUM_OF_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT_BALANCE, SUM_OF_SPEND_ACCOUNT_BALANCE, CASELOAD_ID, LAST_NAME || OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS V_PRISONER, DISCHARGE_PAYMENTS_WITH_EVENT_ID.SUM_OF_TRANSACTION_AMOUNT || SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_AVAILABLE || SUM_OF_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT_BALANCE || SUM_OF_SPEND_ACCOUNT_BALANCE - OFFENDER_ADVANCES.OUTSTANDING_ADVANCE AS V_DISCHARGE_TOTAL FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_DISCHARGE_TOTAL
field.legacySql: =([Discharge Payments with Event ID].[Sum of Transaction Amount]+[Sum of Private Cash Available]+[Sum of Savings Account Balance]+[Sum of Spend Account Balance])-[Offender Advances].[Outstanding Advance]

field.name: $ref:V_DISCHARGE_TOTAL
field.legacySql: =([Discharge Payments with Event ID].[Sum of Transaction Amount]+[Sum of Private Cash Available]+[Sum of Savings Account Balance]+[Sum of Spend Account Balance])-[Offender Advances].[Outstanding Advance]
